Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

OperatorKey.description: Maps an sdk address to a Tendermint pubkey.

validator_pubkey.description: TODO: better name to specify this is the Tendermint pubkey for consensus?

Pubkey.description:
A Tendermint validator pubkey.

This type is optimized for the JSON interface. No data validation on the enum cases is performed. If you don't trust the data source, you can create a `ValidatedPubkey` enum that mirrors this type and uses fixed sized data fields.

anyOf.description: Must use 33 bytes 0x02/0x03 prefixed compressed pubkey format
